hero.title: Find perfect corporate sponsors for your projects
hero.subtitle: helpfund.pro helps social projects find potential corporate partners using AI technologies

features.title: How we help
features.subtitle: Our platform uses advanced technologies to find suitable corporate partners

aiSearch.title: AI Search
aiSearch.description: Smart algorithm analyzes your request and finds the most suitable corporate sponsors by region and industry

verifiedData.title: Verified Data
verifiedData.description: Up-to-date company information: BIN, tax data, contacts and financial indicators

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Save interesting companies to consideration list and maintain search query history

cta.title: Ready to find your sponsors?
cta.subtitle: Start searching now. Describe your project, region or industry, and our AI will find suitable corporate partners

about.title: About helpfund.pro
about.description1: We are a website that helps social projects find corporate sponsors. Our mission is to create a bridge between those who need support and those who are ready to help.
about.description2: Using modern technologies and big data, we make the sponsor search process more efficient and transparent.

finder.title: Find Sponsors
finder.placeholder: Describe your request: region, industry, company name...

notLoggedIn.title: Authentication Required
notLoggedIn.description: Please sign in to use the sponsor search feature

welcome.title: Start searching for sponsors
welcome.description: Describe your project, specify region or industry, and we'll find suitable corporate partners

finder.searchError: An error occurred while searching for companies

empty.title: Consideration list is empty
empty.description: Add companies to consideration during search to see them here

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.step1: • Study tax data and financial indicators of companies
nextSteps.step2: • Visit company websites for additional information

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue searching for sponsors

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Create an account to save search results

auth.terms: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

deleteDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. All your data, including search history and consideration list, will be permanently deleted.
